linearizedBaseContracts.name: RefundEscrow

members.name: Closed

parameters.name: state
parameters.documentation:
@dev Constructor.
@param _beneficiary The beneficiary of the deposits.

members.documentation:
@dev Stores funds that may later be refunded.
@param _refundee The address funds will be sent to if a refund occurs.
members.name: deposit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows for the beneficiary to withdraw their funds, rejecting
further deposits.
modifiers.name: close
ast.documentation: @dev Allows for refunds to take place, rejecting further deposits.
modifiers.name: enableRefunds

name: beneficiaryWithdraw

documentation: @dev Returns whether refundees can withdraw their deposits (be refunded).
name: withdrawalAllowed
